840630.name: Fantasy Grounds - Sci-fi Species Vol 1 (Token Pack)
840630.description:
Sci-fi Creatures Vol. 1

Take your game to the stars and into the depths of infinity with Monster Grin's 104 unique tokens of sci-fi species, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, friends, or foes!
Stunningly depicted science-fiction characters will become aliens, androids, lazer-totin goons, planetary patriarchs, fuzzy pals, or utterly odd encounters in your next thrilling adventure in the deepest reaches of the final frontier!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and bring your game up to date!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):
  • Android Girl
  • Brain Eater
  • Four Armed Alien
  • Green Fuzzling
  • Insectoid
  • Lizard Alien
  • Purple Fuzzling
  • Red Martian
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
